TextView.android:text: A G Patil Polytechnic Institute is an engineering college in Solapur, Maharashtra, India. The college was started in 2008. The college has five branches: Mechanical, Computer, IT, Civil, and Electronics and Telecommunication.[1] and also the one of the best college at a small city level, supporting staff and other activities related to sports and studies here knowledge is wisdom A G Patil Polytechnic Institute is an engineering college in Solapur, Maharashtra, India.
